SELECT u.user_no, u.user_name, u.user_id, f.user_no as USER_NO_F FROM USER_TBL u full outer join follow_tbl f on u.user_no = f. follow_no WHERE u.user_no not in (select user_no from follow_tbl group by user_no) and (u.USER_ID LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} ||'%' or u.USER_NAME LIKE '%' || #{searchValue} ||'%') and u.USER_NO != #{userNo} and u.USER_ID != 'admin'
